document_data.name: Malek Stones
document_data.mainbody:
'''Malek Stones''' was a reporter employed by [[Baldur's Mouth]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Damn it damn it DAMN IT! Still missing one link... Oi, shove off! Don't you be peeking at my scoop!''|Malek Stones}}
document_data.Description: Malek was a beardless male [[shield dwarf]] with pudgy features, brown eyes, and short curly brown hair.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Malek Stones worked on investigative scoop articles for the ''Baldur's Mouth Gazette''. During the [[Absolute crisis]], the irate dwarf could be found working on his pieces within Baldur's Mouth's offices in [[Heapside]] of the [[Baldur's Gate/Lower City|Lower City]].
